nodes.text: A Khanate was a military division within the Kaleesh military structure known as the Kolkpravis. The Kolkpravis itself consisted of only eight khanates each of which was led by one of the eight Khans who were collectively known as the Izvoshra. Each khanate consisted of several brigades which were led by a Baatar, which in turn consisted of one hundred hordes each led by Tarkhans, which broke down to one hundred kamen each led by a Blackarms.
